DOC.brief_summary: Primary objective: - Rate of complete chemotherapy induced alopecia (WHO grade III or IV, physician grading) Secondary objective: - Compliance to scalp cooling procedure - Received number of cycles of chemotherapy in each subgroup - Patient perception of scalp cooling procedure - Side effects of scalp cooling systems
DOC.brief_title: START: Swiss Taxotere Alopecia Prevention Trial
